body:
Recently we have had some leadership changes within the Senior Staff Team, so we thought that now is the most appropriate time to make a community update and inform you all of what has happened and what is to come.

Retirements
Pelpelajax retired from Moderator & Translator.
PieZ retired from Moderator.
Rinn stepped down from Administrator.
Palaemon stepped down from Manager.

Promotions
Posighdun was promoted to Administrator.
Eteh was promoted to Junior Moderator.
Kyoal was promoted to Junior Moderator.
CrazyCreeper_521 was promoted to Moderator.
Palaemon was promoted to Senior Moderator.
Fouled was reassigned to Senior Moderator.

Regarding the manager rank
After discussing it with Ethan we have decided to remove the Manager Rank for various reasons. It won't be returning, the decision is final. We will be tweaking the Senior Moderators roles in the near future to make up for this removal.

Regarding Staff Applications
Staff Applications closed on the 1st of May but we are still dealing with some applications here and there. Please be patient, we hope to have all the responses out ASAP. 

What to except in the future (this month)
- Updating the rules.
- Some gameplay changes :^)
- Possibly a tournament. 
- Small changes to the policies.
- The staff system/structure being redone, to make work more effective.
- Other minor stuff.

As always, the Administrative Team is open to feedback and to opinions on a wide range of issues. Whilst we cannot incorporate every idea and opinion you have, we can take it onboard when we make decisions. We need your support to fix Avicus. If anyone has any queries or concerns please hit me up on Community Slack.

The Administrative Team is very excited for what is to come of Avicus and what the future holds. We hope you all are too :P

Regards,

The Administrative Team (Peter, Ethan & Keenan)

Retirements

PieZ retired from Moderator.
Rinn stepped down from Administrator.
Palaemon stepped down from Manager.

Promotions
Posighdun was promoted to Administrator.
Eteh was promoted to Junior Moderator.
Kyoal was promoted to Junior Moderator.
CrazyCreeper_521 was promoted to Moderator.
Palaemon was promoted to Senior Moderator.
Fouled was reassigned to Senior Moderator.

Regarding the manager rank
After discussing it with Ethan we have decided to remove the Manager Rank for various reasons. It won't be returning, the decision is final. We will be tweaking the Senior Moderators roles in the near future to make up for this removal.

Regarding Staff Applications
Staff Applications closed on the 1st of May but we are still dealing with some applications here and there. Please be patient, we hope to have all the responses out ASAP.

- Some gameplay changes :^)
- Possibly a tournament. 
- Small changes to the policies.

- Other minor stuff.

As always, the Administrative Team is open to feedback and to opinions on a wide range of issues. Whilst we cannot incorporate every idea and opinion you have, we can take it onboard when we make decisions. We need your support to fix Avicus. If anyone has any queries or concerns please hit me up on Community Slack.

The Administrative Team is very excited for what is to come of Avicus and what the future holds. We hope you all are too :P

Regards,

The Administrative Team (Peter, Ethan & Keenan)
title: Community Update & The Future Of Avicus

replies.body:
I'll go through your points and officially address my opinion on each....

Ethan made himself official because he wanted too.
I can admit to this poor choice I made, as I believed at the time that from my point of view the officials were not doing any work, and I tried to take action. As of now, I know that I was mistaken and I even sat down with the officials to talk about my mistakes. We physically voted on who to keep in the official team, and I was OFFICIALLY voted into their team, as any other official can confirm. I wouldn't

He threatened us managers because we voiced our opinions. He also worked completely by himself not even asking his fellow Admin for help
Both of those points are COMPLETELY invalid, sorry mate. I only remember getting mad at you, because your voiced your opinion too often, and completely over took other moderators opinions. You straight up told moderators that their opinions were "literal cancer", which is COMPLETELY unacceptable, which is why I told you that you could receive a staff warning. Also I always went to peachy for help, I would like to consider us both friends.  

 I appreciate your feedback on the choices that we made, but I do not appreciate you making false claims, thanks.

replies.body:
Sorry, if you hadn't commented I wasn't gunna join in but that official nonsense is a lie. I was involved with the decision for who stayed on the official team and who got promoted along with the managers. You then took the decisions we all made and decided to go about your own decisions which initially resulted in robo's demotion. It was only due to the pressing of myself and several of my associates that you gave him his position back. The official demotions/promotions were something handled on an administrative level with feedback from me until you took these actions upon yourself.

The manager argument more valid but not entirely, but ofc Idk about what goes on between yall Sr. staff. ;)

I was involved with the decision for who stayed on the official team and who got promoted along with the managers. You then took the decisions we all made and decided to go about your own decisions which initially resulted in robo's demotion. It was only due to the pressing of myself and several of my associates that you gave him his position back. The official demotions/promotions were something handled on an administrative level with feedback from me until you took these actions upon yourself.

The manager argument more valid but not entirely, but ofc Idk about what goes on between yall Sr. staff. ;)

The manager argument more valid but not entirely, but ofc Idk about what goes on between yall Sr. staff. ;)

replies.body: The revote was held on prompt of you, in order for it to be an official made decision the officials would have taken the initiative of forming the vote. Had you wanted to use official policy you would have retired from the position and let them take initiative. This was you using your administrative powers to your benefit. Until that point you hadn't even broached the subject of you or jozz becoming official.
replies.body_tagged: The revote was held on prompt of you, in order for it to be an official made decision the officials would have taken the initiative of forming the vote. Had you wanted to use official policy you would have retired from the position and let them take initiative. This was you using your administrative powers to your benefit. Until that point you hadn't even broached the subject of you or jozz becoming official.

reply_to.body: I admitted to that first part, but I am pointing out that the official team reverted my decisions, and then made a re-vote to promote the people that currently are on the team.
reply_to.body_tagged: I admitted to that first part, but I am pointing out that the official team reverted my decisions, and then made a re-vote to promote the people that currently are on the team.

replies.body:
To clarify for people I will recount my experience in this situation that I find relevant.
First, I had a meeting with Peachy and Ethan in which I requested the demotion of all officials. They made a statement which was "Show me proof the community wants this". I then collected statements from over 60 avicus regulars and for the majority tournament competitors who stated that they wanted all officials demoted and for interviews to be given to new prospects as well as the old officials; this list included 4 officials. Ethan then contacted me and we held another meeting in which he asked me who should be demoted, because we both agreed there were some good officials.
The two of us and michael then decided on a good list of officials. The list was: Sli, Seth, Javi, Robo, Tazz, Jive, Michael. Michael was told he would be head official. The day of the officials' demotion came and as I watched them drop off the staff page I was suprised to see robo go. At this point I got in a call with robo and told him I would get him his position back. After talking to Ethan he did indeed grant robo his position back but also promoted both himself and Jozz to the position, which had never been discussed or agreed upon. Ethan also left people such as Vobaseball and Pelpel in the official slack which bred anti-Michael sentiments. Michael later told me he felt his reign as Head official would be ineffective due to these feelings and thought it would be better to retire as  to allow the other officials to do their job unhindered.
Ethan later decided he wanted to work with the officials on a smoother level so he gave them the ability to vote him and the rest officials (both demoted and current) back in or out of position. These votes were run by ethan and in order for an official (many of which held other staff positions) to vote against him they would have to directly confront an administrator of a server and tell him they wanted him demoted, not to mention this same administrator had just demoted several of their fellow officials. These re-votes led to the return of GrapeSmoothie and Vobaseball along with justifying Ethan's position along with the positions of those who he promoted: Seth and Jozz.

"I know Ethan is Hitler'ing the server but I can't do anything about it" -Peachy when he was Admin
